SEARCH
Package com.leonteqsecurity.WholesaleFoodStore.Respository.Interface

Interface CustomerDAO

public interface CustomerDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) interface for interacting with customer data in the Wholesale Food Store application.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addCustomer(Customer customer)
    Adds a new customer to the data store.

    Deletes a customer by their unique identifier.

    Retrieves a list of all customers.

    Finds a customer by their unique identifier.

    Updates the information of an existing customer.

  • Method Details

    • findAllCustomers

      List<Customer> findAllCustomers()
      Retrieves a list of all customers.
      Returns:
      A list containing all customers.

    • findCustomer

      Customer findCustomer(int customerId)
      Finds a customer by their unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The unique identifier of the customer to find.
      Returns:
      The customer with the specified identifier, or null if not found.

    • deleteCustomer

      boolean deleteCustomer(int customerId)
      Deletes a customer by their unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The unique identifier of the customer to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the customer was successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • updateCustomer

      boolean updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      Updates the information of an existing customer.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer object containing updated information.
      Returns:
      true if the customer was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • addCustomer

      boolean addCustomer(Customer customer)
      Adds a new customer to the data store.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer object to add.
      Returns:
      true if the customer was successfully added, false otherwise.
